rdb package configuration metadata

Source: R/rdb.gen.R
pkg_config.Rd

A tibble with metadata of all possible rdb package configuration options. See pal::pkg_config_val() for more information.

Usage

pkg_config

Format

A tibble with the columns key, default_value, default_value_dynamic, require, and description.

Examples

rdb::pkg_config
#> # A tibble: 13 × 5
#>    key                          default_value default_value_dynamic require description

#>  6 nocodb_host                  <chr [1]>     NA                    TRUE    RDB NocoDB server host address. Required for [rdb::reset_nocodb()].
